p: Moringa oleifera leaf has also shown protective activities in spermatogonial cells and mitigates the cell damage of mice injected with cyclophosphamide (Nayak, Honguntikar, et al., 2016). The hexane extract of MOL has been reported to enhance seminiferous tubule, epididymis, testis, and seminal vesicle functions in male mice (Cajuday & Pocsidio, 2010). In addition, Barakat, Khalil, and Al‐Himaidi ( 2015) reported that MO combined with hormone supplementations improved the rate of maturation of sheep oocytes and could act as a promoter to induce mRNA expression and synthesis of essential proteins for the maturational processes.
